[Bounty - Tāhae](/bountyTahae/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |head = Vailian Tricorn |body = Vailian Clothing (Deadfire){{!}}Vailian Clothing |weapon1 = Stiletto (Deadfire){{!}}Stiletto |internalname = NPC_WM_Abocco |guid = 1cf96a2c-e8a6-44fc-8623-fb081750e462 }} '''Abocco''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|A Vailian shouts over the din of the Wild Mare to get your attention, turning a great many heads to study your exchange. He takes a hearty swig of his tankard.}} Abocco is a novice bounty hunter fixer, looking for someone to take on his bounty contracts. Problem is, there are no takers, no matter how much he slurs his speech. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started =* [Bounty - Meryel the Mad](/bountyMeryelTheMad/) * [Bounty - Pūrākau](/bountyPurakau/) * [Bounty - Nomu the Marauder](/bountyNomuTheMarauder/) * [Bounty - Tāhae](/bountyTahae/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * Abocco offers a slew of bounties.
